name: DiscoverCT
body:
### Welcome
DiscoverCT was a final project for the Master of Information Management and Systems program at UC Berkeley's School of Information. The site is no longer active, but you can read more about it on our [project page](http://www.ischool.berkeley.edu/programs/mims/projects/2015/discoverct).

### Contact
The DiscoverCT project team was [Colin Gerber](http://colingerber.com) and [Jason Ost](http://jasonost.com). Our faculty advisor was [Professor Marti Hearst](http://people.ischool.berkeley.edu/~hearst), and we also received significant support and direction from [Anobel Odisho, MD](http://profiles.ucsf.edu/anobel.odisho).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
